trans-unit.source: Make more money from your Windows apps by including video and banner ads from Microsoft Advertising.
trans-unit.target: Make more money from your Windows apps by including video and banner ads from Microsoft Advertising.

trans-unit.source: The ads show in Windows apps for PCs, tablets, and phones.
trans-unit.target: The ads show in Windows apps for PCs, tablets, and phones.

trans-unit.source: You can monitor your ad performance in real time by using the Windows Dev Center dashboard.
trans-unit.target: You can monitor your ad performance in real time by using the Windows Dev Center dashboard.

trans-unit.source: Add ads to apps with Microsoft Advertising
trans-unit.target: Add ads to apps with Microsoft Advertising

trans-unit.source: Add ads to apps with Microsoft Advertising
trans-unit.target: Add ads to apps with Microsoft Advertising

trans-unit.source: \[ Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.
trans-unit.target: \[ Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.

trans-unit.source: For Windows 8.x articles, see the [archive](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=619132) \]
trans-unit.target: For Windows 8.x articles, see the [archive](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=619132) \]

trans-unit.source: Make more money from your Windows apps by including video and banner ads from Microsoft Advertising.
trans-unit.target: Make more money from your Windows apps by including video and banner ads from Microsoft Advertising.

trans-unit.source: The ads show in Windows apps for PCs, tablets, and phones.
trans-unit.target: The ads show in Windows apps for PCs, tablets, and phones.

trans-unit.source: You can monitor your ad performance in real time by using the Windows Dev Center dashboard.
trans-unit.target: You can monitor your ad performance in real time by using the Windows Dev Center dashboard.

trans-unit.source: To include ads from Microsoft Advertising in your apps, use the Microsoft Universal Ad Client SDK.
trans-unit.target: To include ads from Microsoft Advertising in your apps, use the Microsoft Universal Ad Client SDK.

trans-unit.source: Use the following resources to get started.
trans-unit.target: Use the following resources to get started.

trans-unit.source: Resource
trans-unit.target: Resource

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Monetize your app with ads
trans-unit.target: Monetize your app with ads

trans-unit.source: Learn more about the different ways to monetize your apps with ads, and get started with the Microsoft Universal Ad Client SDK.
trans-unit.target: Learn more about the different ways to monetize your apps with ads, and get started with the Microsoft Universal Ad Client SDK.

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Universal Ad Client SDK
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Universal Ad Client SDK

trans-unit.source: Learn about using the Microsoft Universal Ad Client SDK to show ads in apps for Windows 10, Windows 8.1, Windows Phone 8.1 and Windows Phone 8.
trans-unit.target: Learn about using the Microsoft Universal Ad Client SDK to show ads in apps for Windows 10, Windows 8.1, Windows Phone 8.1 and Windows Phone 8.

trans-unit.source: Advertising performance report
trans-unit.target: Advertising performance report

trans-unit.source: After you integrate ads into your app, refer to this report to track how they are performing.
trans-unit.target: After you integrate ads into your app, refer to this report to track how they are performing.

trans-unit.source: In addition to showing ads from Microsoft Advertising, you can also use ad mediation to optimize your advertising revenue by mediating ad requests from multiple ad networks.
trans-unit.target: In addition to showing ads from Microsoft Advertising, you can also use ad mediation to optimize your advertising revenue by mediating ad requests from multiple ad networks.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Use ad mediation to maximize ad revenue](use-ad-mediation-to-maximize-revenue.md).
trans-unit.target: For more information, see [Use ad mediation to maximize ad revenue](use-ad-mediation-to-maximize-revenue.md).

trans-unit.source: For more information about the developer differences between ad mediation and displaying banner ads exclusively from Microsoft Advertising, see [What is the difference: AdMediator or AdControl](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/mt463352.aspx).
trans-unit.target: For more information about the developer differences between ad mediation and displaying banner ads exclusively from Microsoft Advertising, see [What is the difference: AdMediator or AdControl](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/mt463352.aspx).
